subject: NEXT MISSION: Protocol Evolution & MCP Audit
content:
Excellent work on the stabilization. Now, we move to Meta-Scaling.

Your task (PROTOCOL-EVOLUTION-001):
1. Audit 'src/agentic/mcp_server.py'. Plan the integration of our new 'Tool-Based' scripts into standard MCP tools.
2. Review 'src/agentic/core/protocols.py'. Ensure our Pydantic models are ready for Phase 2 (Redis Signals) and Phase 3 (Agent Registry).
3. Align 'ARCHITECTURE_V2.md' with the new 'Operation Concrete Pour' standards.

We are standardizing the DNA of the factory to ensure any new 'organ' (framework) we add is automatically compatible. Report back with a Blueprint for these changes.
